mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT t1.ID_ AS processInstanceId, t1.NAME_ AS formName, t1.TENANT_ID_ as systemSn, t1.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS businessKey, t1.START_TIME_ AS startTime, t1.END_TIME_ AS endTime, t2.FIRST_ AS approver, t2.ID_ AS approverId FROM act_hi_procinst t1 LEFT JOIN act_id_user t2 ON t1.START_USER_ID_ = t2.ID_ WHERE t1.START_USER_ID_ = #{userCode}
